disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Mark of the Kindred.

blurb.value: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

description.value: Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 75 − 250 (based on Marks)  bonus range on her basic attacks and abilities.

description2.value: Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of enemy champions to take down, which is hidden while in combat with an enemy champion. Once selected, there's an 8 second delay before the Mark can be collected, and Lamb can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for 4 minutes.

description3.value: Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically selects a monster camp within the enemy's jungle based on Lamb's current Marks for 180 seconds: 0 : Rift Scuttler 1 – 3: Rift Scuttler, Crimson Raptor, Gromp 4 – 7: Ancient Krug, Blue Sentinel, Greater Murk Wolf, or Red Brambleback 8 + : Rift Herald or Baron Nashor, Dragon or Elder Dragon Wolf will select another monster camp 40 seconds after killing a marked monster. If an ally kills a hunted jungle monster within 6 seconds of Kindred damaging it, Kindred will still acquire the stack. The marked camp is highlighted on the mini map to both teams. The mark is removed when the camp is cleared even if Kindred are not involved.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Dance of Arrows.

effect radius.value: Kindred's  attack range

blurb.value: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

description.value: Active: Lamb dashes in the target direction, gaining  25% (+ 5% per Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and firing up to three arrows to nearby visible targets after dashing, each one dealing physical damage. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.

description2.value: Casting Wolf's Frenzy or using Dance of Arrows while inside its area will reduce this ability's  cooldown to an amount.

description3.value: Lamb can cast any of her abilities during Dance of Arrows'  dash.

description4.value: Dance of Arrows resets Lamb's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* The dash does not have a fixed range, it can be directed by up to 340 units.
 The dash distance can be extended to up to 400 units when dashing across terrain.
 The cooldown will not be modified if it cannot be reduced (the current cooldown would have to be less than the reduction amount in this case).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Wolf's Frenzy.

blurb.value: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.

description.value: Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack heals her for up to 49 − 100 (based on level), based on Kindred's missing health.

description2.value: Active: Wolf dashes to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf autonomously attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.

description3.value: Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks slow the target by 50% for 2 seconds.

leveling3.value: Magic Damage:25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's current health)

description4.value: Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area or dies.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Wolf is untargetable and ghosted but he cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation. Wolf is not able to re-target Rift Scuttler if he loses sight of her while he's attacking it. Wolf's Frenzy does not end if Lamb enters resurrection.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Mounting Dread.

target range.value: 500 − 750 (based on Marks)

blurb.value: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

description.value: Active: Lamb applies a mark to the target enemy for 4 seconds and cripples them, slowing them by 50% for 1 second.

description2.value: Lamb's attacks against the target refreshes the mark's duration. If she manages to basic attack the marked target twice, her third attack directs Wolf to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against monsters.

leveling2.value: Bonus Physical Damage:80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's missing health)

description3.value: Wolf's pounce will critically strike for (50% +  37.5%) bonus physical damage against targets below 15% − 65% (based on critical strike chance) of their  maximum health.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The bonus damage will not benefit from critical strikes unless the target is below the maximum health condition.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Lamb's Respite.

blurb.value: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

description.value: Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a 0.264 seconds cast time. All units inside the zone cannot be reduced below  10% of their maximum health, and will become invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be healed, but can still  regenerate health.

description3.value: All targetable units within the zone are healed immediately when the blessing ends.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Lamb's Respite will affect all champions, minions, and monsters, but not wards, turrets, or jungle plants. Lamb's Respite will affect untargetable units but does not grant them the heal at the end of the blessing. Execution effects will bypass Lamb's Respite threshold and leave the unit at 1 health. This does not occur if the unit is at the threshold, as they are invulnerable. Health costs will ignore Lamb's Respite's threshold. The cost will not be paid if the caster is below the threshold. Lamb's Respite has no effect on zombie state units. The effects are applied before the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
